sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Printer, Download, ArrowLeft } from "lucide-react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Invoice = ({ onBack }) => { const location = useLocation(); const [job, setJob] = useState(location.state || null); // Get the job data from location.state const [loading, setLoading] = useState(!job); useEffect(() => { if (!job) { setTimeout(() => { setJob({ invoiceNumber: "INV-2025-015", name: "", address: "", description: "", date: new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0], servicePrice: 0, transport: 0, tax: 0, totalPrice: 0, items: [{ description: "Sample Service 1", price: 100 }], }); setLoading(false); }, 1000); // Simulated loading delay for fallback data } }, [job]); if (loading) { return (
); } const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; return (
{/* Top Bar */}
{/* Invoice Details */}
{/* Header */}

DANIEL MOBILE DETAILING

75 Heath Road, Locks Heath,

Southampton, SO31 6BJ

Phone: 078 69 99 7211

INVOICE NO: {job.invoiceNumber}
DATE: {job.date}
{/* Client Details */}

BILL TO

{job.name || "N/A"}

{job.address || "N/A"}

{/* Items */}
{job.items.map((item, index) => ( ))}
DESCRIPTION PRICE
{item.description} £{item.price.toFixed(2)}
{/* Totals */}
SERVICE PRICE £{job.servicePrice.toFixed(2)}
TRANSPORT £{job.transport.toFixed(2)}
TAX £{job.tax.toFixed(2)}
TOTAL PRICE £{job.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}

Thank you for your business!

); }; export default Invoice;
